name: Gad Jacobs
bio: I'm a software developer driven by my love for tech and how it works. I'm mostly writing frontend for web applications with React and Redux, but I am comfortable writing Node JS on the backend as well. I am hardly very opinionated and very open to trying out new tools/languages if you can convince me. I have got a fair amount of knowledge testing large scale software applications too. Finally, everything is better in dark mode :)

selectedWorks.projectDescription: Sky-Gad (sky guide) is a simple React application that consumes the OpenSky API to show major cities and their air traffic including the estimated departure and arrival times of the aircrafts.
